Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{3: 'When we finally got to the altar, Liv was kneeling on the ground, exhausted. The King picked up the complete artifact next to her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Oh, you still have the strength to make it here. Too bad...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "I already have the Goddess' artifact!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "He's got it after all!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The artifact was glowing like a rainbow in the King\'s hand. Just like the name "Goddess" suggested, it emitted a warm, calming power.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Now that you've got what you want, don't forget our victory. You know what to do.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Of course. Let me turn into my complete form and grant you victory with the power of the system. Thank you for helping me, heroes!', 4: '1'}
{3: "After Vera's reminder, the artifact emitted a blazing light. The King's human body slowly collapsed, with new limbs sticking out."}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Ahhhh, this is it... The power of the artifact. I can feel power flowing into myself!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After some trembling, he turned into a giant mechanoid that looked nothing like a human.'}
{3: 'It was ball-shaped and equipped with external modules that could launch mini-robots and missiles. The giant observation device in the center of its body was blinking a mysterious red light.'}
{3: 'But more importantly, the system menu showed that the King finally had an HP bar.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Behold, my true, invincible body! This is my power!', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's just a Riot, isn't it?", 3: '24', 4: 'Does he have an HP bar now?', 5: '32'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Hah, I'm no regular Riot. Call me King Riot!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Isn't that more stupid?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're right, Commandant. Usually, when Boss turns into this state, we can start attacking.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's do it then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "How arrogant! Don't you dare look down on me, heroes!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Hmph, whatever you say, I now possess the power of the system... Behold, the Goddess' artifact!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The King was going to do something with the artifact, but he suddenly received a heavy blow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Too noisy! Control your volume, you big fat machine!', 4: '1'}
{3: "It was a shot from Karenina's cannon. No longer shackled, she was standing in front of Liv to protect her."}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "What's going on? I thought Vera had you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I never said I would keep her till the end.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The King took another hit on the top. The artifact fell off his "head", and was quickly picked up by Camu.'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'What is this... What are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, we should also start moving.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah.', 3: '57', 4: 'Protect Liv first!', 5: '59'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Wait, what? Are you going to come at me now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah. We will need her for the final battle.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Can't you see? The question is so unnecessary.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I know this is only a game, but I just hate to follow other people's orders. Especially when the person thinks he can control everything like Kurono.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "I don't hate you in person, but I prefer to ditch the stupid Boss.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'What the heck are you talking about!?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What a fool... Vera and Camu had been bluffing you all the time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Both them and us have only been waiting for you to have a proper HP bar.', 4: '1'}
